728440f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Avenue
728440f-a.text:
Arthur Kill Road, south side, east of Richmond Avenue,
showing the residence on the George W. White estate. View 2
shows the 3-story barn and sheds. The estate was at one time known
as the Green Ridge tock farm.
Spring 1924
Views 1, 2
P. L. Sperr
NO RERODUCTIONS
728440f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729320f-b.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Arthur Kill Road
729320f-b.text:
Richmond Avenue, north of Arthur Kill Road, showing
construction work in progrrss on the new Fresh Kills pridge
over Richmond Creek. View 3 shows pontoons with pipes from
sandsucker.
January 31, 1931
Views 1-2-3
P. L. Sperr

729322f-c.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Arthur Kill Road
729322f-c.text:
Richmond Avenue, north from Arthur Kill Road,
showing, on the rignt side f the thorougidare, land being
filled for the erection of a new bridge over Richmond Creek.
The three views were taken the same day.
January 31, 1931
Views 1-2-3
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTI.NS

728366f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Avenue
728366f-a.text:
893 Arthur Kill Road, adjoining the N.W. corner
of Richmond Avenue. This house is located on the estate
of Emma L. Banker. The sign over the doorway reads:
Concordia Collie Kennels, 7uppies for Sale, Boarding.
May 17, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REFRODUCTIONS
728366f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728447f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Avenue
728447f-b.text:
(1)
Arthur Kill Road, south side, between Richmond
and Wainright Avenues, showing the Bancker (Banker) House.
The house is about 500 feet south of the road and is approach-
able by a private driveway.
May 17, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
Another view of the house and the private
driveway as seen from Arthur Kill Road. The sign on
the house reads: Will Rent For Restaurant.
May 17, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REFRODCTIONS
728447f-b.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY
